price: 14. And dutiful towards his parents, and he was neither arrogant nor disobedient (to Allâh or to his parents).
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
